dcterms:creator: I. S. Reed
G. Solomon
dcterms:description: Reed-Solomon (RS) codes are maximum-distance separable linear codes defined over a large Galois field, used as outer codes in concatenated coding schemes to improve error correction performance.
dcterms:title: Reed-Solomon (RS) codes

dcterms:creator: E. Arıkan
dcterms:description: Polar codes are the first practical channel codes that are asymptotically optimal for binary-input memoryless symmetric channels, used in the design of neural encoder-decoder pairs.
dcterms:title: Polar codes

dcterms:creator: E. Arıkan
dcterms:description: Low-density parity-check (LDPC) codes are a class of linear error-correcting codes that are used for error correction in communication systems.
dcterms:title: Low-density parity-check (LDPC) codes

dcterms:creator: Y. Jiang
et al.
dcterms:description: Turbo autoencoder is a deep learning-based channel code designed for point-to-point communication channels, enhancing error correction capabilities.
dcterms:title: Turbo autoencoder

dcterms:creator: A. V. Makkuva
et al.
dcterms:description: KO codes are a novel class of codes that utilize nonlinear encoding and decoding techniques for reliable wireless communication, leveraging deep learning.
dcterms:title: KO codes

dcterms:creator: D. Forney
dcterms:description: Concatenated codes are a coding scheme that combines multiple codes to achieve better error correction performance, particularly useful for long blocklengths.
dcterms:title: Concatenated codes

dcterms:creator: Y. Polyanskiy
H. V. Poor
S. Verdú
dcterms:description: The dataset discusses channel coding rates in the finite blocklength regime, providing insights into performance limits for coding schemes.
dcterms:title: Channel coding rate in the finite blocklength regime

dcterms:creator: S. Cammerer
et al.
dcterms:description: Trainable communication systems are designed to adaptively learn communication protocols and coding schemes, enhancing performance in various channel conditions.
dcterms:title: Trainable communication systems

dcterms:creator: S. H. Lim
J. Han
W. Noh
Y. Song
S.-W. Jeon
dcterms:description: Hybrid neural coded modulation combines neural networks with traditional modulation techniques to enhance communication performance.
dcterms:title: Hybrid neural coded modulation

dcterms:creator: T. Erseghe
dcterms:description: The dataset provides bounds based on Laplace integrals and their asymptotic approximations for coding in the finite-blocklength regime.
dcterms:title: Coding in the finite-blocklength regime

dcterms:creator: T. Dozat
dcterms:description: The dataset discusses the incorporation of Nesterov momentum into the Adam optimization algorithm, enhancing training efficiency for neural networks.
dcterms:title: Nesterov momentum in Adam
